doc:
John Spencer (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Spencer_(actor) 0 John Spencer (December 20, 1946 – December 16, 2005) was an American actor. He is best known for his role as Leo McGarry on the NBC political drama series The West Wing. His performance on the show eventually earned him a Primetime Emmy Award in 2002. John_Spencer ( December_20_,_1946 – December_16_,_2005 ) was an_American_actor . He is_best_known for his_role as Leo_McGarry on the_NBC_political_drama_series The_West_Wing . His_performance on the_show eventually earned him a_Primetime_Emmy_Award in 2002 .
